name: Money Brand Classic Tee – White
description: Premium heavyweight cotton tee with the original Money Brand wordmark in black. Clean, gallery-ready, and built to outlast every trend.

name: Money Brand Coin Logo Tee – Black
description: Signature black tee with the Money Brand coin logo in metallic gold. Street luxury positioned above Psycho Bunny, below Celine.

name: Luxe Metallic Gold Hoodie
description: Full metallic gold Money Brand hoodie with tonal embroidery. Smooth interior, heavyweight body, red-carpet outer shell.

name: Luxe Metallic Silver Hoodie
description: Metallic silver hoodie with discreet Money Brand branding. Clean, future-facing, made for night shoots and flash photography.

name: Currency Crew – Benjamin Franklin
description: All-over Benjamin Franklin currency crewneck. Tastefully toned-down palette with museum-level print clarity.

name: Signature Leather Belt – Black + Gold
description: Black Italian leather belt with the Money Brand coin buckle in brushed gold. The quiet flex that holds the whole fit together.

name: Currency Strap Belt – Brown
description: Brown leather belt with currency strip inlay. Understated from a distance, wild up close.

name: Money Brand Classic Cap – Black
description: Classic black cap with Money Brand wordmark in gold. Everyday uniform piece for the brand faithful.

name: Money Brand Metallic Gold Cap
description: Metallic gold cap with tonal embroidery. Designed to sit in the same conversation as Celine and LV caps, priced strategically below.
